pages.text: The attractive properties of covalence dust lend themselves fairly well to making a universal magnet. While not the strongest magnet out there, the black hole band gets the job done and can be used freely.

Simply using it, or pressing the 'Change Mode' key, while holding it will activate the ring. While active, nearby items will be pulled toward the user at no cost. Putting an active ring into an alchemical chest or bag will make it attract and pick up items.
